title: [Onboarding] Update sign-in flow
body:
### User Story
As an existing user, I want to log into my account or choose from multiple accounts, if I have them. 

### Description
_Type_: Feature

_Summary_: Update account sign-in flow according to new [onboarding designs](https://www.figma.com/file/dEIljL7UPbXgsZUA0Q4qlE5E/Onboarding?node-id=927%3A14702). 

#### Expected behavior
The two primary sign-in screens have minor UI adjustments.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11790366/57222440-dce8ca80-7002-11e9-8eb8-7fc1dd8d6420.png)

#### Actual behavior
![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15470435/56672331-47554e80-6684-11e9-939e-f3c69b9157b8.png)![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15470435/56672373-589e5b00-6684-11e9-9d00-5e155945c7c4.png)

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 150.0 DAI (150.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8032/3129). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8032/3129). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $85,324.80 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)

➤ Rachel Hamlin commented:

Waiting to get bounty applicant approved; will then estimate date.

@sudeepb02 Hello from Gitcoin Core - are you still working on this issue? Please submit a WIP PR or comment back within the next 3 days or you will be removed from this ticket and it will be returned to an ‘Open’ status. Please let us know if you have questions!
* [x] reminder (3 days)
* [ ] escalation to mods (6 days)

Funders only: Snooze warnings for [1 day](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8032/3129?snooze=1) | [3 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8032/3129?snooze=3) | [5 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8032/3129?snooze=5) | [10 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8032/3129?snooze=10) | [100 days](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8032/3129?snooze=100)

Hi team,

I have taken up this issue and currently going through the technical documentation and contributing guidelines. I am a beginner in Clojure, so still figuring out most of the stuff. I have downloaded the app from Play Store, but I guess the screens mentioned in this issue were after the app was released. How do I reproduce this issue? And where else to look at? Please guide me in the right direction.

Thanks.

@sudeepb02 Hi! Thank you for willing to contribute to the project! Please try to setup your dev environment as described [here](https://status.im/build_status/), and let us know how it goes.

The screens that need to be changed are displayed during app login and are located in 3 rows below the `User Opens Status` label in Figma (3 top ones starting with `Sign in`).

Welcome @sudeepb02 and thanks for working on this issue. For the screens, this is your best, up-to-date reference: https://www.figma.com/file/dEIljL7UPbXgsZUA0Q4qlE5E/Onboarding?node-id=1625%3A20964

@errorists , can you please confirm?

Hi @siphiuel @hesterbruikman 

Thanks for the resources. I am done with the initial setup. I installed all the packages on a VPS. Is it possible to compile the app, and then download and install the apk to my device? I tried running `make startdev-android-real` and ran into errors.
@sudeepb02 which errors exactly did you run into? Did also try with an AVD?
Hi @siphiuel . I am running it on a VPS. So won't be able to use an AVD.
@sudeepb02 Maybe you can use VNC or some other remote desktop tool? You definitely need to be able to have a proper development environment so that to iterate quickly.

Copy update on these screens:

On account list view: Recover a key > Access key
On numpad: Recover key > Access key
On password entry: Recover key > Access key

Hello Team,
Because of not having a proper dev setup, I'm sorry that I won't be able to complete this issue. I'd be stopping work on gitcoin so someone else can take this up.

I have applied to get this task done. Do I have to be approved first before I continue?
Thanks.
@rachelhamlin @StatusSceptre  as i know @siphiuel is working on it

Thank you @rachelhamlin 

@flexsurfer I think the gitcoin activity tracker is broken as I do not **see** anyone working on it and it indicates that I have started work. In the meantime, I will apply to other status projects.

hey @emmaodia please do not start work, core contributor is working on this issue, thanks
Sorry about that @emmaodia! You might be interested in this issue instead? #8130
